ProcessingActionBox.TITLE: Processing
ProcessingActionBox.IMPORT_IMAGE_BUTTON_TOOLTIP_TEXT:
Select a histologic lung image
for processing
ProcessingActionBox.IMPORT_WEIGHTS_BUTTON_TOOLTIP_TEXT:
Select a weights file to load
into the computer vision AI
ProcessingActionBox.MINIMUM_CONFIDENCE_SPIN_BOX_TOOLTIP_TEXT:
Set the confidence threshold
that pixel classifications
must exceed to appear in
output
ProcessingActionBox.ACTION_BUTTON_TOOLTIP_TEXT:
Process the provided image
using the provided weights in
a computer vision AI model

PostprocessingActionBox.TITLE: Postprocessing
PostprocessingActionBox.MANUAL_THRESHOLD_CHECKBOX_TOOLTIP_TEXT:
Toggle between using a
user-determined or
dynamically-determined
binarization threshold
PostprocessingActionBox.MANUAL_THRESHOLD_SPIN_BOX_TOOLTIP_TEXT:
Set the binarization
threshold for distinguishing
between tissue and airspace
PostprocessingActionBox.REMOVE_SMALL_PARTICLES_TOOLTIP_TEXT:
Set the minimum component size
to exclude small matter
(e.g., immune cells)
PostprocessingActionBox.REMOVE_SMALL_HOLES_SPIN_BOX_TOOLTIP_TEXT:
Set the minimum component
size to exclude small spaces
(e.g. non-airspace gaps in
tissue)
PostprocessingActionBox.ACTION_BUTTON_TOOLTIP_TEXT:
Further process the image to
create a complete label map
with filled lumens

AssessmentsActionBox.TITLE: Assessments
AssessmentsActionBox.TOOLTIP_TEXT:
Calculates Airspace Volume Density (ASVD)
and/or calculates Mean Linear Intercept 
(MLI) with provided settings
AssessmentsActionBox.ASVD_CHECKBOX_TOOLTIP_TEXT:
Toggle whether to perform
ASVD when "Run Assessments"
is clicked
AssessmentsActionBox.MLI_CHECKBOX_TOOLTIP_TEXT:
Toggle whether to perform MLI
when "Run Assessments" is
clicked
AssessmentsActionBox.NUMBER_OF_LINES_SPIN_BOX_TOOLTIP_TEXT:
Set the number of test lines
for MLI
AssessmentsActionBox.MIN_LENGTH_SPIN_BOX_TOOLTIP_TEXT:
Set the minimum chord length
to exclude small chords from
MLI
AssessmentsActionBox.SCALE_SPIN_BOX_TOOLTIP_TEXT:
Scale the pixel MLI result to
convert the value to physical
units (e.g., micrometers)
AssessmentsActionBox.ACTION_BUTTON_TOOLTIP_TEXT:
Run morphometry assessments
with given parameters and
display results

ExportActionBox.TITLE: Export Results
ExportActionBox.ADD_BUTTON_TOOLTIP_TEXT:
Stage the latest morphometry
results for export
